casebody.data:
No. 09-571. Harry F. Connick, District Attorney, et al., Petitioners v. John Thompson. 561 U.S. 1056, 131 S. Ct. 64,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1150,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5761. September 28, 2010.

Motion of Former Federal Civil Rights Officials and Prosecutors for leave to participate in oral argument as amici curiae and for divided argument denied.
